title-group.article-title: On the Distinctness of Modular Reductions of Maximal Length Sequences Modulo Odd Prime Powers

abstract.p: We discuss the distinctness problem of the reductions modulo M of maximal length sequences modulo powers of an odd prime p, where the integer M has a prime factor different from p. For any two different maximal length sequences generated by the same polynomial, we prove that their reductions modulo M are distinct. In other words, the reduction modulo M of a maximal length sequence is proved to contain all the information of the original sequence.
